name: Fear Of Traffic
description: Introducing Fear Of Traffic: the game for everyone, playable anywhere.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64 bit Processor: Intel® Core™ m3, AMD Quad-Core 2.5GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel® HD 615, Nvidia GT640, AMD Radeon HD7750, 1GB Vram DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c Compatible Sound Card with Latest Drivers
